Zyghost

articles    

Home

A zyghost is the essence of a thing before, during and after that thing's existence. It is a thorough description of what a thing is - the instructions needed to create it. A zyghost is a timeless, permanent encoding of a thing that transcends the thing itself.

My name is Schell Scivally and this is my blog. I'm a guy in Northern California who likes to bike, skate, build, and write about things I'm working on.

I like the idea of DNA, code, blueprints and plans as the zyghost of things that can exist in the physical world and this blog serves to explore the process that brings a zyghost into existence. Zomg!
